title: Police hunt for couple who kept having sex on train
text:
Police are hunting the couple who were seen taking part in several sex acts on the train

Police have said they are looking for an amorous couple who decided a night train from Glasgow to Edinburgh was the place for them to make love.

Unable to wait to get home, they engaged in a number of sex acts on the table and empty seats before leaving the train.

British Transport Police said they had seen the footage from Saturday night and are making enquiries.

CCTV footage lasting two minutes captured the moment they started kissing to the moment they started having sex across the seats.

If anyone recognises the couple, they should contact police.

Meanwhile, ScotRail hit out at the couple and said they were trying to clamp down on such antics.

A spokesman for the firm said: ‘Anti-social behaviour has no place on Scotland’s Railway, and we will continue to work with the British Transport Police to clamp down on unacceptable conduct.’

Anyone with information is asked to contact BTP by sending a text to 61016 or by calling 0800 40 50 40.
